objects.description: Patchwork uses malicious documents to deliver remote execution exploits as part of (Citation: Initial Access). (Citation: PaloAlto Patchwork Mar 2018) (Citation: Cymmetria Patchwork) (Citation: Symantec Patchwork) (Citation: Securelist Dropping Elephant)
